author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: أن اذکري ما ظهر من أُمّ الأشرف الّذي فدی نفسه في أرض الزّآء أَلَاإانّه في مقعد صدق عند مقتدر قدیر
translation: Call thou to mind the behavior of As̱hraf’s mother, whose son laid down his life in the Land of Zá (Zanján). He, most certainly, is in the seat of truth, in the presence of One Who is the Most Powerful, the Almighty.
